example.title: Cost of Buying Dumplings
example.program:
dum = int(input("Enter the number of dumplings to buy: "))
amount = 2.5 * dum
if dum > 20: amount = amount - 0.5 * (dum - 20)
print("Amount to pay is $", amount)
